string.name: champion_details_title
string.translation_description: Title for the champion details screen where the user can see the details for a specific champion.

string.name: champions_title
string.translation_description: Title for the 'Champions' screen where the user can see the list of champions available in BB.

string.translation_description: Title for the 'Skills' screen where the user can see a list of skills available in BB.

string.translation_description: Accessibility text for each of the champion images shown in the 'Champions' screen.
